subject: Asian female warrior-assassin character
action: Posing dramatically, with variations including: standing alert with weapon drawn, meditating in rain, engaging in acrobatic combat moves
setting: Moody urban or traditional Asian architecture backdrop, with atmospheric effects like rain or embers
time: Night or twilight, with dramatic lighting

style.rendering_technique: 3D render or highly detailed digital painting

lighting.type: Dramatic, with strong contrasts and rim lighting
lighting.color_palette: Dark blues and blacks with golden highlights, warm skin tones

detail_level: Ultra-high detail, focusing on skin texture, fabric details, and environmental effects

composition_details.shot_type: Close-up or medium shots, focusing on face and upper body
composition_details.angle: Straight-on or slight low angle to emphasize power

cultural_reference: Blend of traditional Asian warrior aesthetics with modern fantasy elements
temporal_aspect: Timeless, mixing traditional and futuristic elements

character_details.hair: Long black hair, often in a high ponytail or bun with loose strands
outfit_variations: Black leather armor with golden accents and intricate patterns
Traditional silk robes with armor elements
Sleek, modern interpretation of ninja attire
Revealing warrior princess outfit with ornate jewelry

environmental_effects: Heavy rain with water droplets on skin and clothes
Cherry blossom petals in the wind
pose_variations: Stoic, straight-standing pose with intense gaze at viewer
Relaxed pose showcasing sensuality and confidence
negative_prompt: Low quality, blurry, distorted proportions, anachronistic elements, culturally insensitive stereotypes, excessively revealing or inappropriate outfits
